I am using the built in eclipse test runner.
The settings in Windows->Prefe=
rences->Java->JUnit only show me some 
packages and classes, I think they a=
re of JUnit3, such as: 
JUnit.framework.TestCase.
I can't see 'Enable Asser=
tion for JUnit... ' anywhere.

Ofer
